bdi4jade.belief

Class TransientPredicate<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.core.MetadataElementImpl
      • bdi4jade.belief.AbstractBelief<K,V>
        • bdi4jade.belief.TransientBelief<K,java.lang.Boolean>
          • bdi4jade.belief.TransientPredicate<K>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Belief<K,java.lang.Boolean>, Predicate<K>, MetadataElement, jade.content.Concept, jade.content.ContentElement, jade.content.Term, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class TransientPredicate<K>
extends TransientBelief<K,java.lang.Boolean>
implements Predicate<K>
    This class extends the TransientBelief class and represents a transient propositional belief, which is not persisted in a permanent memory.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes
    See Also:

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TransientPredicate()
      The default constructor.
      TransientPredicate(K name)
      Creates a new transient propositional belief, whose value is true.
      TransientPredicate(K name, java.lang.Boolean value)
      Initializes a transient propositional belief with its name and a initial value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TransientPredicate

        public TransientPredicate()
        The default constructor. It should be only used if persistence frameworks are used.

        public TransientPredicate(K name)

        public TransientPredicate(K name,

        value - the initial belief value.
